name: backend
description: **MAKE SURE YOU ARE IN THE `backend` FOLDER** ```bash cd backend ``` ### Create the virtual environment. ```bash python -m venv .venv ``` ### Activate the virtual envionment. - Windows: ```bash .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 ``` - Linux, MacOS ```bash source ./.venv/bin/activate ``` ### Install the requirements ```bash pip install -r requirements.txt ``` ### Select the environment 1. With the main.py file open, at the bottom right click the text that says the python version (the right one). 2. Select 'Enter interpreter path...' 3. Enter `./backend/.venv/bin/python3.12`
